modName: Coins of Tamriel v4 LE - Nordic Currency Name Correction
summary: Patch for Coins of Tamriel V4 by Force70. Renames Nordic currency from Alessia to Felldir. Alessia was a Cyrodilic Saint that had no dealings with Skyrim. Felldir the Old was one of the 3 heroes who freed the Nords from the Dragon Regime,  of the first Dragon War.
descriptionHtml:
I like Coins of Tamriel but the name Force70 gave the Nordic coins just rubbed my OCD-ness the wrong way. He named the Nordic coins Alessia. [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Alessia]Saint Alessia[/url] was a Cyrodilic historical figure that has nothing to with Skyrim or Nords. She was the founder of the first human Cyrodiil Empire after liberating Cyrodiil's humans from Ayeleid slavery.

I chose to rename currency from Alessia to Felldir. [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Felldir_the_Old]Felldir the Old[/url], [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Gormlaith_Golden-Hilt]Gormlaith Golden-Hilt[/url] and [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Hakon_One-Eye]Hakon One-Eye[/url] overthrew the Dragons in the first Dragon War.

[b]UPDATE[/b]: Some people in the comment section have pointed out some very interesting links between Alessia and the Ancient Nords that I have missed. I stand corrected. :) I guess at this point, it'll boil down to preference. My personal preference is still Felldir over Alessia and I'll be leaving this patch for whoever wants it. :D

[b]Credits and Requirement:[/b] Force70 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51871/?]Coins of Tamriel V4 Legendary Edition[/url]. I don't take any credit for his mod, I simply did the name change for one of the currencies.

Install Coins of Tamriel normally and put this patch after it's esp in your load order.
author: thebunnyrules
